actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on a certain chemical used in the textile industry and in water treatment.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to specify, through December 31, 2000, the duty on phosphonic acid (((phosphonomethyl) imino) bis (2,1-ethanediylnitrilobis (methylene)) tetrakis (used in the textile industry and in water treatment).

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on a certain chemical used in the textile industry and in water treatment.
